text: Every man must define his identity against his mother. If he does not, he just falls back into her and is swallowed up.
author: Camille Paglia

text: My mother used to tell me man gives the award, God gives the reward. I don't need another plaque.
author: Denzel Washington

text: Motherhood is priced Of God, at price no man may dare To lessen or misunderstand.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

text: The fastest way to break the cycle of perfectionism and become a fearless mother is to give up the idea of doing it perfectly - indeed to embrace uncertainty and imperfection.
author: Arianna Huffington

text: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to.
author: Mike Krzyzewski
